text: The Defense of Tsaritsyn () is a 1942 Soviet drama movie directed by Vasilyev brothers.Все оставляя людям…ОБОРОНА ЦАРИЦЫНА (1-Я СЕРИЯ) It stars Mikheil Gelovani, Nikolay Bogolyubov, and Mikhail Zharov. == Actors == * Mikheil Gelovani as Joseph Stalin * Nikolay Bogolyubov as Kliment Voroshilov * Mikhail Zharov as Perchikhin * Varvara Myasnikova as Katya Davydova * Pyotr Nikashin as Parkhomenko == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1942 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: The Defense of Tsaritsyn
